thing-type.label: Command
thing-type.description: The Command Thing encapsulates a shell command to be executed

parameter.name: transform
parameter.label: Transform
parameter.description: The transformation to apply on the execution result

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Interval
parameter.description: Interval, in seconds, the command will be repeatedly executed

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: Time out, in seconds, the execution of the command will time out

channel-type.label: Output
channel-type.description: Output of the last execution of the command

channel-type.label: Exit Value
channel-type.description: The exit value of the last execution of the command

channel-type.label: Running
channel-type.description: Indicator whether the command is currently being executed

channel-type.label: Execute
channel-type.description: When triggered with by ON, the command will be executed

channel-type.label: Last Execution
channel-type.description: Time/Date the command was last executed
